Data Structures

struct  StructuredDataHeader

Detailed Description

RecordHandler provides access to structured data stored in a File. Clients have to provide
  • a File as data source descriptor,
  • a Record which is used for deleting rows,
  • and the maximum number of rows to be stored in the file.
RecordHandler creates the file with a fixed size according to the maximum row count and fills all rows initially as deleted (row_count = 0). It maintains header information about the file:
  • header size
  • version of the record
  • the length of a record.
